mapper.insert: insert into basicmovie(num, title, eng_title, genre, director, actor, year, nation, trailer, pub_date, watching_rate, play_time, story, thumnail, keyword, user_rating) values(BASICMOVIE_SEQ.nextval, #{title}, #{eng_title}, #{genre}, #{director}, #{actor}, #{year}, #{nation}, #{trailer}, #{pub_date}, #{watching_rate}, #{play_time}, #{story}, #{thumnail}, #{keyword}, 0)
